FuncDef:
The session cdn send delay command configures the device to send CDN messages only after receiving LCP termination ack messages in response to the LCP termination request messages it sends.
The undo session cdn send delay command restores the default configuration.
By default, the device sends LCP termination request messages and CDN messages at the same time.
ExtraInfo: If the interconnected LAC requires the device to send CDN messages only after the device receives LCP termination ack messages, run the session cdn send delay command.
